page.title: 11EDUCATION
page.content: GLENMEAD J.I.SCHOOL Glenmead School is situated on the Great Barr border with Kingstanding,in the Perry Barr consortium. The building occupies an open site with its own field and sports field in Glenmead Road. The school opened in 1971 and was extended in 1975 with the addition of a six classroom open plan infant wing. There are approximately 230 children on roll in 9 classes with a 2-class speech and language unit in addition. The staff consists of head +10 teachers with the language unit in addition.
